gaffer.operation.impl.cache

Class UpdateCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.operation.AbstractOperation<Iterable<SEED_TYPE>,Iterable<RESULT_TYPE>>
      • gaffer.operation.AbstractGetOperation<Object,Object>
        • gaffer.operation.impl.cache.UpdateCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheOperation, GetOperation<Object,Object>, Operation<Iterable<Object>,Iterable<Object>>

    public class UpdateCache
extends AbstractGetOperation<Object,Object>
implements CacheOperation
    A UpdateCache allows the results of a previous operation in an OperationChain to be added to a cache, keyed on an optional key. If a key is not provided the default key is 'ALL'. The cache is maintained per single OperationChain only. It cannot be used across multiple separate operation requests. So, it must be updated and fetched inside a single operation chain.
    See Also:
    FetchCache, FetchCachedResult
